activities: Personal information is collected only from those who sign up for our services. The information is used for billing purposes, and for enabling communication between our technical support staff and the client. Personal information is never given to any third party, unless the client makes a request that we give said information to a specific third party.
eucountries: France, Germany, Italy, Norway, Poland, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
